tools.title: Toolbox
tools.description: This page offers a collection of tools that help you get your work done.

about.title: About this page
about.description: What makes tools.kup.tz special, why this page exists, etc.

content.intro: This website serves as a central hub for a collection of tools that I have developed over time. It was created to bundle my projects and ideas in one place and make them accessible.
content.development: The content of this page is continuously expanded and updated, with a focus on providing useful solutions. However, it may happen that the page appears incomplete or empty at times – this is a natural part of the development process, as I only program appropriate tools when I need them.
content.contact: If you have questions or suggestions, please don't hesitate to contact me.
content.hosting: By the way: this page is completely serverless, hosted on Cloudflare Pages and uses Cloudflare's features to provide the tools.

tokens.title: About Tokens
tokens.intro: This website uses tokens to control the use of various tools. Tokens are a type of virtual credit that is available to you to use the site's features. Some tools that require server-side processing consume tokens. This helps control server load and ensure that the site is not overloaded.
tokens.abuse: The tokens are also intended to prevent abuse. After all, I am the operator of this site and therefore also the recipient of the bill from Cloudflare.
tokens.generation: There is no way to buy or increase tokens. Tokens are automatically generated and are the same for every user. Tokens are valid per IP subnet, so you receive your tokens per internet connection, not per device. This also means that you can share tokens with other users who are on the same subnet. For this reason, I don't show anywhere how the tokens of a subnet are consumed.
tokens.reset: Tokens reset daily at 00:00 UTC. This means that you have a new amount of tokens available every day to use the tools. If you have used up your tokens, you can simply wait until the next day begins to regain access to the features.
tokens.opensource: This site is open source. If you ever need more tokens than you get per day, you can also host it yourself and adjust the token limits. The source code is available on GitHub.

current.used: tokens have already been consumed and

mx.title: MX Resolver
mx.description: Resolves MX records for a domain.
mx.heading: MX Resolver
mx.description1: This tool can query an MX record. The tool resolves it and also resolves the associated records (A and AAAA).
mx.description2: An MX record (Mail Exchange Record) is a DNS entry (Domain Name System) that specifies which mail server is responsible for receiving emails for a particular domain. It is used to deliver emails correctly.
mx.domainDescription: Here you can specify the domain for which you want to resolve the MX records. Please enter only the domain here, without protocol or similar (e.g. kup.tz).
mx.tokenUsage: Using this tool consumes {tokens} tokens per query. Please note that you only have a limited number of tokens available.
mx.providerFound: The email provider for this domain is probably {name}.
mx.providerNotFound: The email provider for this domain could not be automatically determined.

errors.invalidDomain:
The domain does not seem to be valid.
Please try again.

ns.title: NS Resolver
ns.description: Resolves NS records for a domain.
ns.heading: NS Resolver
ns.description1: This tool can query an NS record. The tool resolves it and also resolves the associated records (A and AAAA).
ns.description2: NS records (Nameserver records) are an important part of the DNS system (Domain Name System). They specify which nameservers are responsible for a particular domain. These nameservers are responsible for answering queries for this domain and providing the corresponding DNS entries.
ns.domainDescription: Here you can specify the domain for which you want to resolve the NS records. Please enter only the domain here, without protocol or similar (e.g. kup.tz)
ns.tokenUsage: Using this tool consumes {tokens} tokens per query. Please note that you only have a limited number of tokens available.
ns.providerFound: The DNS provider for this domain is probably {name}.
ns.providerNotFound: The DNS provider for this domain could not be automatically determined.

errors.invalidDomain:
The domain does not seem to be valid.
Please try again.

scan.title: DNS Scanner
scan.description: Tries to scan a website as accurately as possible.
scan.heading: DNS Scanner
scan.description1: This tool can scan a website to get information about it. Various DNS records are queried to obtain information about the domain.
scan.description2: This tool is useful if you want to migrate a domain to a new provider but don't have access to the original zone.
scan.domainDescription: Here you can specify the domain you want to scan. Please enter only the domain here, without protocol or similar (e.g. kup.tz)
scan.tokenUsage: Using this tool consumes {tokens} tokens per query. Please note that you only have a limited number of tokens available.
scan.cache: Scan results are cached for up to one hour. If you scan the domain again, the result may not be updated immediately. If a cached query is returned, no tokens will be deducted from you.

truncated.title: Further resolution of DNS records was aborted because the response was too long.
truncated.message: The list below is not complete.

errors.invalidDomain:
The domain does not seem to be valid.
Please try again.

md5.title: MD5 Hash Generator
md5.description: Quickly generate an MD5 hash from text or a file online.
md5.heading: MD5 Hash Generator
md5.descriptionText: With this tool you can generate an MD5 hash from text or a file.
md5.descriptionPrivacy: The hash is generated in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.

sha1.title: SHA-1 Hash Generator
sha1.description: Quickly generate a SHA-1 hash from text or a file online.
sha1.heading: SHA-1 Hash Generator
sha1.descriptionText: With this tool you can generate a SHA-1 hash from text or a file.
sha1.descriptionPrivacy: The hash is generated in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.

sha256.title: SHA-256 Hash Generator
sha256.description: Quickly generate a SHA-256 hash from text or a file online.
sha256.heading: SHA-256 Hash Generator
sha256.descriptionText: With this tool you can generate a SHA-256 hash from text or a file.
sha256.descriptionPrivacy: The hash is generated in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.

bcrypt.title: Bcrypt Hash Generator
bcrypt.description: Creates Bcrypt hashes and checks passwords against Bcrypt hashes.
bcrypt.heading: Bcrypt Hash Generator
bcrypt.descriptionText: With this tool you can create Bcrypt hashes. Bcrypt is a cryptographic hash algorithm specifically designed for passwords.

dkim.title: DKIM Generator
dkim.description: Creates DKIM key pairs in the browser (WebCrypto) and generates the DNS entry.
dkim.heading: DKIM Generator
dkim.descriptionText: Create DKIM key pairs exclusively in the browser (WebCrypto). No data is sent to the server.

spf.title: SPF Generator
spf.description: Creates SPF DNS entries via UI in the browser.
spf.heading: SPF Generator
spf.descriptionText: Create SPF DNS entries comfortably in the browser. No data is sent to the server.
spf.ipv4Desc: IPv4 addresses from which emails from the domain may be sent.
spf.ipv6Desc: IPv6 addresses from which emails from the domain may be sent.
spf.includeDomainsDesc: Include SPF entries from other domains.
spf.fallbackPolicyDesc: How should the recipient react to invalid emails?
spf.importDesc: Insert existing SPF record, the settings on the left will be automatically filled.
spf.importError: Invalid SPF record. Expected: starts with v=spf1
spf.generatedEntryDesc: The entry can be entered as a TXT record for the domain.

dmarc.title: DMARC Generator
dmarc.description: Creates DMARC DNS entries in the browser.
dmarc.heading: DMARC Generator
dmarc.descriptionText: Create DMARC DNS entries comfortably in the browser. No data is sent to the server.
dmarc.domainOptionalDesc: Optional: Used to display the record name (e.g. _dmarc.example.com).
dmarc.policyDesc: Determines how recipients handle non-conforming emails: none = reports only, quarantine = quarantine, reject = reject.
dmarc.subdomainPolicyDesc: Applies to subdomains. If empty, the main policy (p) is used.
dmarc.adkimDesc: adkim controls DKIM alignment: relaxed (r) allows subdomains, strict (s) requires exact domain match.
dmarc.aspfDesc: aspf controls SPF alignment: relaxed (r) allows subdomains, strict (s) requires exact domain match.
dmarc.ruaDesc: Multiple recipients possible. It is recommended to use mailto: (e.g. mailto:dmarc{'@'}example.com).
dmarc.foDesc: Controls when forensic reports are sent: 0 = only when both SPF and DKIM (aligned) fail, 1 = on every error, d = on DKIM error, s = on SPF error.
dmarc.pctDesc: pct determines what percentage of messages are subject to the policy (default 100%).
dmarc.riDesc: ri specifies the interval in seconds for aggregate reports (default 86400 = 24 hours).
dmarc.generatedDesc: The entry is published as a TXT record.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: Creates secure passwords based on custom templates.
passwordGenerator.heading: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.descriptionText: The tool can be used to generate passwords. Passwords are generated in the browser using WebCrypto.
passwordGenerator.charLegend: Letters, numbers and special characters have different colors.
passwordGenerator.validationError: {required} categories are required, but the password has only {available} characters.
passwordGenerator.atLeastOneCategory: At least one character category must be allowed.
passwordGenerator.descriptionPrivacy: Passwords are not transmitted to the server or stored on it.

totp.title: TOTP Generator
totp.description: Generates time-based one-time passwords (TOTP) in the browser only.
totp.heading: TOTP Generator
totp.descriptionText: TOTPs (Time-based One-Time Passwords) are generated exclusively in the browser and are not sent to the server.
totp.label: Label
totp.scanQrCode: Scan this QR code with your TOTP app

rsa.title: RSA Crypt online
rsa.description: Quickly encrypt and decrypt data with RSA.
rsa.heading: RSA Keygen + Encryption/Decryption
rsa.descriptionText: With this tool you can encrypt and decrypt data online via RSA.
rsa.descriptionPrivacy: Encryption is performed in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.
rsa.descriptionNote: Uses RSA-OAEP with SHA-256 hash, generates {size}-bit keys.

aes.title: AES Encryption/Decryption
aes.description: AES-256-bit encryption and decryption with AES-GCM in the browser.
aes.heading: AES Encryption/Decryption
aes.descriptionText: With this tool you can encrypt and decrypt data online via AES GCM.
aes.descriptionPrivacy: Encryption is performed in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.
aes.descriptionNote: Uses AES-GCM, the number of bits depends on the key size.

pfx.title: PFX/PKCS#12 Generator
pfx.description: Creates a PFX/PKCS#12 certificate from Private Key, Certificate and optional CA chain.
pfx.heading: PFX/PKCS#12 Generator
pfx.descriptionText: With this tool you can create a PFX/PKCS#12 certificate from a Private Key, a Certificate and optional CA chain.
pfx.privateKeyDesc: The Private Key in PEM format
pfx.caChainDesc: The CA Chain in PEM format (can contain multiple certificates)
pfx.passwordDesc: The Password for the PFX file
pfx.noPasswordWarning: You have not entered a password for the PFX file. The PFX file will be created without a password.
pfx.noPasswordWarning3: do not allow specifying an empty password. PFX without password can cause problems. If you don't want to use a password, just use abc123 as the password.
pfx.noPasswordMessage: You have not entered a password for the PFX file. The PFX file will be created without a password. If the application in which you want to import the PFX file still requests one, try it with an empty password.
pfx.noPasswordNote: Some applications do not support PFX files without a password or do not allow specifying an empty password. PFX without password can cause problems if you "store the file securely anyway", just use abc123 as the password.

csr.title: CSR Generator & Parser
csr.description: Creates or parses Certificate Signing Requests (CSR) in the browser.
csr.heading: CSR Generator & Parser
csr.descriptionText: With this tool you can create Certificate Signing Requests (CSR) or parse and analyze existing CSRs. The tool shows you information about the requester as well as information about the public key and possibly information about the signature.
csr.descriptionGenerate: If you want to generate a new CSR, provide the Private Key (or generate one) and fill out the form with the data below. After clicking "Create CSR", the CSR will be displayed in PEM format.
csr.descriptionParse: If you want to parse an existing CSR, copy it into the text field above and click "Parse CSR". The Private Key is not required to parse a CSR.
csr.descriptionPrivacy: Processing is performed in the browser, no data is transmitted to the server.
csr.csrDesc: For submission to a CA, can be deleted after certificate issuance
csr.rsaPrivateKeyDesc: Keep secure, required for using the certificate issued by the CA.
csr.rsaPrivateKeyNote: Only required if CSR is generated
csr.organizationDesc: Name of the company/organization or person
csr.parseSuccess: CSR parsed successfully and form filled
csr.rawFormat: The CSR is displayed here in raw format after it has been parsed or generated.

certificate.title: Certificate Parser
certificate.description: Parses and analyzes X.509 certificates in PEM format, including certificate chains.
certificate.heading: Certificate Parser
certificate.descriptionText: With this tool you can parse and analyze X.509 certificates in PEM format. You can enter individual certificates or entire certificate chains.
certificate.descriptionNote: The tool shows you all important information about each certificate, including Public Key details, validity, purpose and Certificate Transparency information.
certificate.descriptionPrivacy: Processing is performed in the browser, no data is transmitted to the server.
certificate.certificatePlaceholder: One or more certificates in PEM format (can be an entire chain)
certificate.subject: For (Subject)
certificate.heading: Certificate Parser
certificate.issuerNotFound: Issuer certificate not found in chain
certificate.noExtendedKeyUsageExtension: No Extended Key Usage extension present
certificate.sctDataPresent: SCT data present, but structure could not be parsed

json.title: JSON Formatter
json.description: Allows interactive browsing of a JSON object.
json.heading: JSON Formatter
json.descriptionText: With this tool you can format and make JSON data readable. Simply paste the JSON text into the text field and click "Format JSON". The tool will analyze the JSON text and output it in a readable format.
json.invalidJsonMessage: The content is not valid JSON. Please check the content and try again.

csv.title: CSV Converter
csv.description: Converts different CSV formats to each other.
csv.heading: CSV Converter
csv.descriptionText: CSV files are usually separated by commas (,). However, in Germany it is common for CSV files to be separated by semicolons (;). This tool converts CSV files from comma to semicolon and vice versa.
csv.descriptionPrivacy: The conversion is performed in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.
csv.descriptionNote: The conversion is only basic, as I only need it occasionally for small things. For example, there are small problems with quotation marks used in the middle of a line.

fritzboxXml2csv.title: FRITZ!Box XML to CSV
fritzboxXml2csv.description: Converts a FRITZ!Box XML address book to CSV.
fritzboxXml2csv.heading: FRITZ!Box xml2csv
fritzboxXml2csv.descriptionText: This tool converts an address book from FRITZ!Box in XML format to a CSV file.
fritzboxXml2csv.descriptionPrivacy: The conversion is performed in the browser, the entered text or selected file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.
fritzboxXml2csv.formatNumbersDesc: Phone numbers are converted to international format
fritzboxXml2csv.advancedMatchingDesc: For phone numbers without "0" at the beginning, the area code is prefixed before parsing
fritzboxXml2csv.countryPrefixDesc: Two-letter code for the default country; e.g. "DE" = Germany
fritzboxXml2csv.note: Phone numbers are converted to international format

imageBase64.title: Images to Base64
imageBase64.description: Convert an image to a Base64 image.
imageBase64.heading: Images to Base64
imageBase64.descriptionText: With this tool you can quickly convert images to Base64 format. This is useful to embed images in HTML or CSS without hosting them externally.
imageBase64.descriptionPrivacy: The conversion is performed in the browser, so no data is sent to a server.

html2markdown.title: HTML to Markdown
html2markdown.description: Converts HTML code to Markdown format.
html2markdown.heading: HTML to Markdown
html2markdown.descriptionText: With this tool you can quickly convert HTML code to Markdown format.
html2markdown.descriptionPrivacy: The conversion is performed entirely in the browser, so no data is sent to a server.
html2markdown.markdownPlaceholder: The converted Markdown code will appear here...
html2markdown.notReady: The tool is still loading. Please wait a moment.

progressBar.title: Progress bar Generator
progressBar.description: Generate progress bars via URL, usable e.g. in Markdown.
progressBar.heading: Progress bar generator
progressBar.descriptionText: With this tool you can generate a URL for a progress bar that can be used in Markdown or HTML.
progressBar.descriptionNote: The progress bar is generated as SVG and can be customized in various sizes and colors.

png2ico.title: PNG to ICO
png2ico.description: Converts PNG images to ICO format with various resolutions.
png2ico.heading: PNG to ICO
png2ico.descriptionText: This tool helps you convert a PNG image to ICO format.
png2ico.descriptionNote: Since ICO is a container format, you can convert a PNG image to different resolutions beforehand and then download it as one ICO file. You can of course also download the individual images separately.
png2ico.descriptionPrivacy: The conversion is performed entirely in the browser, so no data is sent to a server. I never get to see your icons.
png2ico.downloadFullIco: You can download the complete ICO container at the end of this box.
png2ico.selectResolution: Please select at least one resolution

resolutions.noteExperimental: (Experimental - ICO doesn't actually support this resolution)

http.title: HTTP Request Tracker
http.heading: HTTP Request Tracker
http.description: With this tool you can log HTTP requests. Simply query the following URL with your application:
http.description2: All requests to all paths of the above URL will then be displayed here. After 3-4 days, logged requests are automatically deleted.

confirm.message: Displaying logs will consume tokens. Do you want to continue?

errors.pleaseSelectResolution: Please select at least one resolution
errors.pleaseEnterCertificate: Please enter at least one certificate

privacy.browserOnly: All calculations are performed only in the browser. Data is not transmitted to the server or stored on it.
privacy.noNetwork: The file is not transmitted over the network to other devices.
privacy.noNetworkOrDevice: The file is not transmitted over the network to other devices or leaves the device.
privacy.notTransmitted: The data is not transmitted to the server or stored on it.
